DOC.brief_summary: Acupuncture may affect nerve function . This study assess effect acupuncture peripheral central nerve system
DOC.brief_title: To Study Mechanisms Acupuncture Through Functional Magnetic Resonance Imaging Peripheral Neurosensory Testing
DOC.criteria: Age 18 80 Male female No acupuncture treatment past 2 week No analgesic past 2 week Absence neuropathic pain state History psychological illness History Claustrophobia Lack ability understand experimental protocol adequately communicate English Pregnancy Pending litigation History head trauma History trauma surgery low extremity pelvic area
